subTitle: We are here to answer all of your questions, wether they are solar related, and, or specific to our products or services

faqs.question: What is the difference between your Premium, Basic, Hybrid, and Flexible Payment Plans?
faqs.answer:
Premium Plan: Outright payment for installation and immediate access to solar or wind energy. 
Basic Plan: Pay-as-you-go model where we install and meter your house, and you buy tokens to recharge.
 Hybrid Plan: Installation of both wind and solar energy systems for maximum efficiency. Flexible Payment Plan: Pay 50% upfront, get the installation, and pay the remaining balance over time.

faqs.question: How long does the consultation and installation process take?
faqs.answer: The initial consultation typically takes a few days, during which we assess your energy needs and property. The design phase follows, and once approved, installation can take anywhere from a few days to a couple of weeks, depending on the complexity of the system.

faqs.question: What kind of maintenance does the solar or wind energy system require?
faqs.answer: Our systems require minimal maintenance. Regular cleaning of the solar panels and periodic inspections of the wind turbines are usually sufficient. We provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your system operates efficiently.

faqs.question: How much can I expect to save on my energy bills?
faqs.answer: Savings vary based on your energy consumption, the size of the installed system, and local energy rates. During the consultation, we provide a detailed projection of your potential savings.

faqs.question: What happens if my system needs repairs?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest trends in DIY and construction, as well as introductions to new tools and techniques. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels.
